underlying_goal: Implement a post-fix plan to update skills docs, linter scripts, and pre-commit hooks after resolving an ImportError in a Databricks notebook, then create a PR and fix CI issues
friction_detail: The initial edit used bare %pip and %restart_python instead of # MAGIC prefixed versions, causing ruff syntax errors in CI.
brief_summary: User asked Claude to implement a 6-file plan for linter/skill updates, create a PR, fix a CI ruff failure, and clarify MAGIC command documentation in skills; all tasks were completed successfully after one CI fix iteration.
